casebody.data:
Anthony Whyte
v.
Commissioner of Correction Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2016

Arthur L. Ledford, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Margaret Gaffney Radionovas, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Anthony Whyte's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 904, 137 A.3d 968 (2016), is denied.
